Name: Mindbytes: Learn to Read Music
About the game: Mindbytes: Learn to Read Music is the most fun way to learn the how to read musical notation. • Learn each note on both the treble and bass clefs • Learn what various musical notation symbols mean • Click the notes to learn how they sound • Think fast and challenge yourself to reach the highest score in the fast-paced and fun game mode • Clicking the correct note earns you time, but getting the wrong answer causes a time penalty • Get as many correct answers as possible before time runs out • Reference flash-cards to look up any notes you haven't memorised yet
